text: San Leo is a comune in the Province of Rimini in the Italian region of Emilia- Romagna. San Leo is next to these municipalities: Acquaviva (San Marino), Chiesanuova (San Marino), Citt√† di San Marino (San Marino), Maiolo, Montecopiolo, Monte Grimano, Novafeltria, Sassofeltrio, Torriana, Verucchio. == References == Category:Settlements in Rimini
title: San Leo
